title: How to Make a Glowing Ice Bulb

steps.headline: Attach the wires to the LED.
steps.description: Ensure they are attached by wrapping some electrical tape around the connection.

steps.headline: Stuff the LED into a balloon.
steps.description: You are just going to stuff the actual LED light and enough so there is no electrical tape exposed.

steps.headline: Fill the balloon with water.
steps.description: After filling it with water, tie the end of the balloon.

steps.headline: Remove the balloon rubber.
steps.description: Make sure that you remove all the rubber from the balloon.

steps.headline: Attach the batteries to the LED, and enjoy your new cool looking light.

text: Attach the wires to the LED. Ensure they are attached by wrapping some electrical tape around the connection. Stuff the LED into a balloon. You are just going to stuff the actual LED light and enough so there is no electrical tape exposed. Fill the balloon with water. After filling it with water, tie the end of the balloon. Freeze the balloon.  Remove the balloon rubber. Make sure that you remove all the rubber from the balloon. Attach the batteries to the LED, and enjoy your new cool looking light.
